text: FDA fast-tracks Chloroquine, modeled after the natural substance quinine in cinchona bark, for use in COVID-19 clinical trials. Read this brief history on Chloroquine, by ABC's Chief Science Officer Stefan Gafner: https://t.co/CjkvWvRxyx #chloroquine #COVID19 #ClinicalTrials https://t.co/f8Y8sECKii
